body:
AVICUSCARCE NEWS (Episode 1) 
By - aagrant99 ; Dated - August 2nd, 2017

What's up guys? aagrant99 here and today were coming out from the other side of a tree to report the Avicus news.


My God!!! Is humanity regressing find out in the article below.

- For our first story today we discussing the secret noob aagrant99. We thought it for years but now we know for certain. We caught him in the act of attempting to build a house.  It was absolutely abhorable and a hideous sight to behold.  Our correspondent Carrie_May reports that after this was brought up in conversation with him, he threw hot coffee at her from a hot café.  Third degree burns from the coffee, were reported. What an uncivilized beast.  

- For our next story of today we report a massive coffee shortage as hot cafes are not being built as often.  Earlier today we sent our correspondent to go inquire of this endemic problem, she reported to us that the reason not as many hot cafes are being built is because of the uncertainty of people in building them, she said that they (the builders) "feared the repercussions of building potentially illegal structures."

- Another story to us today from Ciaan.  Today he retired from his Senior Moderator position.  His reasons for this move as stated by him was "I have a new job as a financial assistant and have other priorities that are of more importance."  He will be missed, but he stated "I will still play on Avicus just not as a Senior Moderator. Perhaps I will come back again to staff one day."  (Indirect quotations).  He has now assumed the "Alumni" title as his prefix.  He is not the only one who has left near or at this time, we have seen multiple "I'm leaving or retiring posts over the last week."

- A story about the trends.  We report that the pgaro dog face meme is still popular, popular indeed.  When asked by our correspondent on meme affairs how it felt to be a meme, he stated "it's interesting."  We have witnessed entire teams composed of people with the pgaro dog skin.  

- The final story for today.  We report that several new changes have recently occurred to Avicus.  _DISTRACTION - recently addressed these changes in a forum post.  Such things as destroy transitions were addressed.  If you want to learn more read his post.

- For the next episode we will answer the questions "Is LFT still looking for a team, or has he found one?" and "Reports of multiple people having died from the cringe that was our first Avicuscarce News post."  Tune into avicuscarce news to hear more exciting news.

AVICUSCARCE NEWS currently at 0 views (Might become negative because of the cringe)

replies.body: I will just create Avicuscarce news then.  Wanted to create something unique so I changed it from a keemstar like reporting to a Scarce like reporting.  Avicus alert was already taken by shadowwolf.  So I made mine Avicusscarce as I want my own unique creation here.  I pray no one beat me to Avicusscarce if they did I will have to do Avicusdefranco.

replies.body: Carrie_May was what I named my correspondent because she was once a very popular avicus player, a great friend, and an extremely kind person.  I wanted for people to think while reading "this name sounds familiar."  I wanted people to remember her impact on the community by using her name.
